name: Ravine Run
description:
Mobile Endless Runner

The longer you last, the faster you run! Aim for a high score!

Collect up to 100 coins per day to spend in the shop for items that will extend your run.

Watch an ad up to 5 times per day for an extra life.

Move Left/Right: Tap/Hold/Tilt screen in direction

Jump: Swipe Up

Pause: Swipe Down/Tap Pause Button
